function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exponential growth of infections in the initial phase of an epidemic","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, rapid spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implementing anti-contagion policies, reducing contact between susceptible and infected individuals","Technologies":"Policy interventions, social distancing measures","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited proportion of immune individuals in the population","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to the disease, higher risk of rapid spread","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, herd immunity strategies","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution, public health campaigns","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Time-varying policy affecting growth rate of infections","Impact":"Potential lagged effects of policies, uncertainty in policy effectiveness","Mitigation":"Monitoring and evaluating policy outcomes, adjusting policies based on data","Technologies":"Data analysis, policy evaluation tools","People":"Policy makers, public health experts","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
